info.description:
# Getting Started

## Document Purpose and Scope

The Scale REST API endpoints are technically described in this document. This document's goal is to instruct readers on how to interface with the Scale REST API. 

 ## Security

The API uses HTTPS as transport layer for security and uses HTTP/1.1 – RFC 7230 for message syntax and routing.

There are 2 ways of authenticating in order to access the REST API.

·    Requesting a bearer token from /authTokens using username and password

·    Requesting a session log on from /authTokens using a PAT token

Authentication using username and password will be phased out after 8.6.

##  GET /authTokens with username and password direct to the App server

Before using this method a user must be set up with access right “Can POST, PUT, GET to the REST API”. This can be done from User Management in the Scale UI.

### Request format

The following table specifies the format and parameters for this request.

| Method    | Type      | Name               | Type               |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------ | ------------------ |
| GET       | Parameter | Username           | URI encoded string |
| Parameter | password  | URI encoded string |                    |

### Response format

The following table specifies the format and parameters for the response.

  

| Successful response | Type      |      |
| ------------------- | --------- | ---- |
| Bearer token        | text/html |      |

The token returned is then uses as a Bearer token in the subsequent calls to the REST API

### Example

The following shows an example of a request to the authentication endpoint:

https://{scale-url}/scale/api/authTokens?username=john&password=password

The username and password in this request may need to be URI encoded.

The token in the response should be supplied in all subsequent requests in an authorization HTTP header.

Authorization: Bearer tcpRoNbIKOJZj9Yn0CL2oiX7m04JJmlAllaskd810incqjslasadjzxzza29axb

Notes:

·    No specific Accept or Content-Type header is required for the authentication endpoint as it will always return text/html as content.

##  POST /scale/api/authTokens with PAT token

Before using this method, a user must be set up with:

·    Access right “Can POST, PUT, GET to the REST API”

·    A PAT token

This can be done from User Management in the Scale UI.

### Request format

The following table specifies the format and parameters for this request.

| Method | Body                           |
| ------ | ------------------------------ |
| POST   | { “privatekey”:”{PAT token}” } |

### Response format

The response passes a Platform.ERP.SessionToken as a cookie.

This cookie should be included in the subsequent calls to the REST API."
info.title: Scale REST API

post.description:
| Property								| Description                                   | Required	|
|---------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|-----------|
| DateTime								| The date and time of the picture.				|   Yes		|
| Description							| The description of the picture.				|   No		|
| RelatedVehicleReg						| The related vehicle reg.						|   No		|
| Base64Picture							| The Base64Picture blob hash of the picture.	|   Yes		|
| RelatedWeighingGuid					| The weighing guid.							|   No		|
| IsAnpr								| The Anpr picture type.						|   No		|
| CompanyOutletGuid						| The CompanyOutlet guid.						|   No		|
| SubscriberGuid						| The Subscriber guid.							|   Yes		|

## Extra validations

| Condition | Error message |
|-----------|---------------|
| If RelatedVehicleReg and RelatedWeighingGuid are both null | Either RelatedVehicleReg or RelatedWeighingGuid property must have a value. |
| If no Weighing is found associated to the ANPR data | Weighing not found for this ANPR data. |
| If Subscriber isnt subscribed to Outlet | Subscriber isnt subscribed to Outlet. |
| If no Outlets were found for Subscriber | No Outlets were found for Subscriber. |

| RFID													| The vehicle RFID optional if Vehicle registration has value. Filterable.			|
| IsDriverRequired										| IF DriverNameRegex from SysConfig has value set to true else false.				|
| DriverNameRegex										| IF DriverNameRegex from SysConfig.												|

| Vehicles[].TransportSupplierSiteGUID					| The vehicle transportSupplierSiteGUID.											|
| Vehicles[].MaxWeight									| The vehicle maxWeight.															|
| Vehicles[].LiveTare									| The vehicle liveTare.																|

| Vehicles[].IsExternalVehicle 							| The vehicle isExternalVehicle.													|
| Vehicles[].IsValid									| The vehicle isValid.																|
| Vehicles[].Carriers[]									| The vehicle supplier site.														|
| Vehicles[].SubscriberOutlet[]							| The vehicle company outlet.														|

| Property														| Description                                                                       |
| --------------------------------------------------------------| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| SubscriberGUID												| The subscriber guid filterable and required.										|
| VehicleGUID													| The vechicle guid filterable and required.										|

| StageWeighing[].TareWeight									| The tareweight associated to the weighing.										|
| StageWeighing[].IsInboundWeighing								| The isinboundweighing indicator of weighing base on weighing type					|
| CurrentLinkedJobs[]											| The current linked jobs does not associated any weighning.						|
| CurrentLinkedJobs[].JobGUID									| The job guid.																		|
| CurrentLinkedJobs[].TicketNo									| The ticketno weighing associated to the job.										|

post.description:
# Applies to integrator/Weighings/ POST Weighings.

# Weighings

| Property                                              | Description                                                    | Required				|
|-------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------- |----------------------|
| SiteOrderGUID                                         | The GUID of the siteorder.                                     | Gate, MaterialSale   |
| RouteGUID                                             | The GUID of the route.										 | Route				|
| WeighingTypeGuid                                      | The Guid of the  weighingtype.                                 | Yes					|
| GrossWeight                                           | The GrossWeight of the weighing.                               | Gate					|
| TareWeight											| The TareWeight of the weighing.                                | MaterialSale		    |
| MaterialGUID                                          | The GUID of the material.                                      | Yes					|
| VehicleGUID                                           | The GUID of vechicle.											 | Yes					|
| WeighingDate                                          | The WeighingDate if null value set to current datetime.        | No					|
| WeighingGUID											| The WeighingGUID if has value update existing record.          | No					|
| WeighingDetails[]                                     | The WeighingDetails of weighing.					             | No					|
| WeighingDetails[].MaterialGUID						| The GUID of the material.										 | No					|
| TransferDetails[]										| The TransferDetails use for weighing type TransferOut.	     | No					|
| TransferDetails[].SourceSupplierSiteGUID				| The GUID of the suppliersite.                                  | No					|
| TransferDetails[].DestinationSupplierSiteGUID			| The GUID of the suppliersite.                                  | No					|
| TransferDetails[].IsPassThrough						| The IsPassThrough of the weighing.                             | No					|
| TransferDetails[].LoadReference						| The LoadReference of the weighing.                             | No					|

## Extra validations

| Condition																	| Error message								|
|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| IF SiteOrderGUID IS NULL and WeighingType Gate/MaterialSale.				| SiteOrderGUID must supply.				|
| IF RouteGUID IS NULL and WeighingType Route.								| RouteGUID must supply.					|
| IF GrossWeight IS NULL and WeighingType Gate.								| GrossWeight must supply					|
| IF TareWeight IS NULL and WeighingType MaterialSale.						| TareWeight must supply.					|
| IF WeighingTypeGUID IS NULL.												| WeightTypeGUID must supply.				|
| IF not exist WeighingGUID.												| Invalid WeighingGUID.						|
| IF not exist WeightTypeGUID.												| Invalid WeightTypeGUID.					|
| IF VehicleGUID IS NULL.													| VehicleGUID must supply.					|
| IF MaterialGUID IS NULL.													| MaterialGUID must supply.					|
| IF TransferDetails IS NULL and WeighingType TransferOut.  				| TransferDetails must supply.				|
| IF SourceSupplierSiteGUIDNotFound IS NULL and WeighingType TransferOut.	| SourceSupplierSiteGUID must supply.		|
| IF SourceSupplierSiteGUIDNotFound IS NULL and WeighingType TransferOut.	| DestinationSupplierSiteGUID must supply.	|
| IF WeighingDetail is not empty and MaterialGUID IS NULL.					| WeighingDetail MaterialGUID must supply.	|

| Property						| Description                               | Required	|
|-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|-----------|
| WeightId						| The weight Id (Guid).						|   Yes		|
| BlobURL						| The blob url of the picture.				|   Yes		|


## Extra validations

| Condition | Error message |
| --------- | ------------- |
| Both WeightId and BlobURL property must have a value. |
